Monster Cookies

  • #desserts
  • #cookies

Ingredients

  • 1 c brown sugar
  • 1 c sugar
  • 3/4 c softened butter
  • 3 eggs
  • 1 1/2 c peanut butter
  • 1 T light corn syrup
  • 2 t baking soda
  • 2 t vanilla
  • 4 1/2 c quick-cooking rolled oats
  • 1/2 pack chocolate chips
  • 1/2 pack M&Ms

Directions

  1. Combine brown sugar, sugar, and butter.
  2. Beat in eggs.
  3. Add peanut butter, corn syrup, baking soda, and vanilla.
  4. Add oats, chocolate chips, and M&Ms.
  5. Drop dough onto an ungreased baking sheet.
  6. Bake for 11 minutes at 350.
  7. Loosen and let cool.
